Settings.TargetUnitSystemHint: The unit system to which data is converted when a "Convert" button is clicked
Settings.GridUnitSystemHint: The unit system with which new scenes (i.e. grid units and distance) are created
Settings.DecimalSeparatorHint: The decimal separator used to determine whether a number is a decimal; necessary for determining whether 1.000 is one thousand or one with three decimal places
